content: this is a legal case that took place in the municipal court of osijek it started on january 16 2024 and the cost of the procedure for the first instance was 20060 eur the case is about a coownership dispute over a property which includes a house courtyard and arable land the coowners identified as rpv and npv each own a 12 share of the property the civil division of the property has been dissolved and it will be sold through a public auction the counterparty npv has been ordered to reimburse rpv for the procedural costs expert assessments were conducted to determine the market value and potential division of the property but since the parties could not agree the court decided to proceed with a judicial sale

civil_codes_used: Article 34 paragraph 4 of Act on extra-judicial procedure
